name: Elansar (itch)
description:
Elansar is a small myst like "point & click" adventure game
The premise of the game is to explore an island and solve puzzles.
Will you uncover the Island's mystery ?
Game available in English, French, German and Spanish language.
This game was created only by myself for 2 years during my free time.

Compatibility:
-PC Windows (XP or 7)
-PC Linux (for x86, needs libsdl1.2, tested on Debian and Knoppix)
-Mac OS X 10.5 or higher (Intel processor only)

-Atari Falcon 030 (VGA 640x480, 2MB of free ram, 50MB of disk space)
-Atari Falcon CT60, CTPCI Radeon/Supervidel (true color version)
-Firebee (true color version)

-Atari Jaguar CD (CDI file to burn on a CD-R using DiscJuggler)
